mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tbl.* from (select r.gid,gnickname,gimage,r.rcode,rcontent,rdate,rscope,rimage,count(g.rcode) count from gmember gm,review r,good g where gm.gid=r.gid and r.rcode=g.rcode and ccode=#{ccode} group by r.gid,gnickname,gimage,r.rcode,rcontent,rdate,rscope,rimage order by count desc) tbl) where rn between 1 and 12
mapper.update: update review set rcontent=#{rcontent} , rscope=#{rscope} where rcode =#{rcode}
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where ccode=#{ccode}
select avg(rscope) from review where ccode=#{ccode}

select * from (select rownum rn, tbl.* from (select r.gid,r.ccode,gnickname,gimage,r.rcode,rcontent,rdate,rscope,rimage,count(g.rcode) count from gmember gm,review r,good g where gm.gid=r.gid and r.rcode=g.rcode and ccode=#{ccode} group by r.gid,gnickname,gimage,r.rcode,rcontent,rdate,rscope,rimage,r.ccode order by count desc) tbl) where rn between 1 and 3
select * from(select rownum rn, tbl.* from(select * from review r inner join cafe c on r.ccode=c.ccode inner join reviewimage ri on r.rcode=ri.rcode where r.gid=#{gid}) tbl)
